titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter from Brian Fairfax esq; dated, London July 23. 1696.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Brian, 1633-1711.
Fairfax, Brian, 1633-1711.

notesStmt.note: In defense of Alderman Thompson of York, against allegations he had misappropriated £600 intended for distribution to the poor of that city.
"To Alderman Thompson" written in manuscript on copy.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
